Buen juego para jugar con amigos , pero con un anticheat deplorable, no importa si estas con prime o no prime los hackers abundan. 
Por otra parte los servidores dejan bastante que desear en tema de registro de balas y estabilidad en general.
Es increible que en pleno 2020 se tengan que utilizar plataformas externas como faceit o Esea para poder jugar en condiciones y con un anticheat decente.

it is simply the best, and most fun fps-game i have ever found. Of course some will not like it, because of how combat in csgo is carried out compared to something like the run and gun action of call of duty for example. This game is for people who find it fun to take things a bit more seriously. Also, please  for the love of god play with a friend group, since the endless screaming russians in soloq make playing this game almost impossible. Also, with your friends you can actually strategize, which is obviously a big part of csgo. You will simply get everything out of csgo if you only play soloq. Obviously this game is great, but it does have its downsides like the inaccessibility of some maps for beginners, due to every nook and cranny having their own callout. Obviously these are necessary for team play, but at the least when i was starting out i found maps like nuke very confusing, and learning callouts for the first time was a nightmare. Also, this game gets even more fun the more you play, because you can hit harder shots and develop/use more complex strategies.
Un clásico atemporal. La prueba de que no hacen falta gráficos brutales y desarrollos hipercomplejos para ser el juego mas disfrutado durante años y años-
